name: City Crusher Arcade System (VIC-20 +3K)
description:
With City Crusher Arcade System, you can play with your favourite version of  the game.

You can select 5  different City Crusher versions:

  1. City Crusher Arcade 
  2. Super City Crusher
  3. Super City Crusher DX
  4. City Crusher Arcade DX (new release! - Namco Coin-Op 80's style.)
  5. City Crusher 1st version 1983.
